overview.en: FGS(Fair go Steel seal) is a pass for Fairgogame. To be simple, users need to exchange FGS(Fair go Steel seal) to join the Fairgogame project. There is no such thing on the market, and Fairgogame's future is unpredictable. The experiment could reshape or even completely demolish the world's view of blockchain. This is not an ICO project, nor is it an exchange. This is not a probability game, nor is it an investment opportunity. It is the ultimate experiment in psychology and economics, and it is as instructive as it is entertaining. This is our approach because the Fairgo Team understands that the best way to get blockchain to the masses is to show the value of blockchain to capital.
overview.zh: FGS(Fair go Steel seal)是作为Fairgogame的通行证，很简单的来讲，用户加入Fairgogame项目，需要兑换FGS(Fair go Steel seal)。目前市面上并没有同类项目，Fairgogame的未来是不可预测的。这个实验可能重塑甚至完全推倒这个世界对区块链的看法。这不是一个ICO项目，也不是交易所。这并不是一个概率游戏，也不是一个投资机会。这是一个心理学和经济学的终极实验，它的教育性和娱乐性相比也毫不逊色。这正是我们的方式，因为Fairgo Team明白，让大众接受区块链的最好方式便是，向资本展示区块链的价值。
